Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தொல்வரவும் தோலும் கெடுக்கும் தொகையாகநல்குரவு என்னும் நசை.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Hankering poverty destroys at once the greatness of (one's) ancient descent and (the dignity of one's) speech.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown being attacked by 'hankering poverty' ('நல்குரவு என்னும் நசை'). This poverty is visualized as a corrosive, creeping grey slime.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The slime is shown to have a dual destructive effect. It covers and dissolves a magnificent, ancient family tree behind the person, destroying their 'ancient lineage' ('தொல்வரவு').
Layered_Composition.Background: Simultaneously, the slime touches the person's mouth, and the eloquent, dignified words they were speaking ('தோல்,' here meaning the skin of the tongue, hence speech) are shown turning into meaningless, stammering gibberish. It destroys both their heritage and their personal dignity at once.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The specific kind of grinding poverty born of desire destroys the two great pillars of a person's status: the nobility of their birth and the dignity of their speech.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Poverty as a corrosive slime is a powerful visual. The simultaneous destruction of the external symbol of status (the family tree) and the internal source of status (eloquent speech) is the key.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Corrosive, destructive, degrading, loss of identity.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bleak, grey, and decaying atmosphere. The corrosive slime is a sickly, ugly grey that drains the color from everything it touches—the green of the tree and the golden light of the speech.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that captures the person and shows the corrosive slime's dual attack on their family tree and their own mouth.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with advanced viscous fluid effects for the slime.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: happy person, healthy tree, eloquent speech, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore the visual of the 'corrosive slime of poverty'.
